profile:
Alair Homes in Calgary brings experience to you that comes from 100's of renovations and new custom home design-builds, Alair stands above the crowd. 

We operate with a policy of 100% transparency meaning that we share with you the quotes and invoices for all costs as we develop your project budget, so that you are informed and have no surprises. Using an amazing on line co-construction project management system, you can log on to your project anytime from anywhere there is an internet connection and stay connected to your renovation or custom home build. You can see the schedule, when we will be done, pictures taken that day of progress, relevant plans, your budget, and an area where you select materials like flooring, plumbing and lighting, colours, etc. Customers rave about Alair's easy to use co-construct that keeps them connected and in control.

With an impressive buying power combined from our locations in Calgary, Vancouver, Nanaimo, Victoria, Edmonton and Ontario, Alair receives the best pricing on materials and we pass the savings to you. We can work with you to develop your designs, providing not only the construction ready plans, but sound advice from having "been there done that" knowing the best cost effective solutions. Alar also will handle all engineering, permits, construction, sub-trades, architects and other professionals. 

Alair is a RenoMark certified renovator providing a full 2 year warranty on renovation work, and a full 2-5-10 warranty on new construction. WCB compliant with liability insurance, we act as the General Contractor for you during a renovation so that you are protected.

Alar has been featured in Homes and Living magazine for outstanding renovations. So whether you want just the bathroom renovated, or a TV worthy extreme renovation, Alar Homes & Renovations should be on your list of who to call! Call 403-408-9951 today and we will promptly arrange for a complimentary visit, advice and budget.
